article: Hello! My name's Alice. I'm a high school student. I'm very _ every week. From Monday to Friday I go to school. I do homework in the evening. I'm so tired that I want to have a good rest at weekend. _  my mother often asks me to go _ with her on Saturday morning. It usually _ me about an hour .I _  enjoy these activities. When my mother goes shopping and I sit on a box and wait for her. Last Saturday, there was more noise than usual and everyone was in a hurry. My mother bought _ of things, such as meat, fish, fruit and vegetables. After one _  , a woman came up to me,"Excuse me,"she said. "Are you Alice? Your mother just _ shopping , but her bags are very heavy. She wants you to carry them home _ her."
